name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1. 常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2. 拉普拉斯 (Laplace) 變換及其在電路上之應用，3. 冪級數及其在微分方程上之解法。
1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order
2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order
3.Laplace transforms
4.Power series
schedule:
Week 1: First-Order Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs)
Week 2: Separable ODEs
Week 3: Exact ODEs
Week 4: Linear ODEs
Week 5: Higher Order Linear ODEs
Week 6: Homogeneous Linear ODEs
Week 7: Nonhomogeneous ODEs
Week 8: Systems of ODEs
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Taylor Series
Week 11: Laplace Transforms
Week 12: Unit Step, Delta, and Gamma Functions
Week 13: Laplace Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals
Week 14: Convolution
Week 15: Frobenius Series
Week 16: Bessel Function
Week 17: Partial Differetial Equations (PDEs)
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam 期中考 40%
Final Exam 期末考 60%
materials: Erwin Kreyszig, Advanced Engineering Mathematics: 10th Edition, Wiley
